question:
[Michele] was happy to babysit her niece, [Fay]. [Fay] was a great child. [Janice], who is the sister of [Judy], is a lovely girl. [Henry] bought a steak dinner for himself and his brother [Martin]. [Janice] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Fay]. [Martin] received a novel for Christmas from his aunt [Judy]. [Larry] and his son [Martin] went to the cinema together. [Martin] and his son [Larry] went to look at cars. [Martin] ended up buying the Mustang. [Gordon]'s mother, [Ethel], told him he was in trouble. Her son [Henry] had told her that [Gordon] had been stealing from her purse.
Question: How is [Michele] related to [Gordon]?
